mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DATATAG (TAGID, TAGNAME, TAGDESC, TAGMODE, TAGDATATYPE, TAGVALUE, TAGVALUEDESC, TAGTIMESTAMP, TAGSRVTIMESTAMP, TAGQUALITYCODE, TAGQUALITYDESC, TAG_EQID, TAGMINVAL, TAGMAXVAL, TAGUNIT, TAGSIMULATED, TAGLOGGED, TAGVALUEDICTIONARY, TAGADDRESS, TAGDIPADDRESS, TAGJAPCADDRESS, TAGRULEIDS, TAGCONTROLTAG ) VALUES (500,'DATATAG_500','DATATAG_500 description',0,'Float', null,'DATATAG_500 value description', #{timestamp, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{serverTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataTagQuality.qualityCode,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{dataTagQuality.qualityDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{equipmentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{minValue,javaType=java.lang.Comparable,jdbcType=BLOB},#{maxValue,javaType=java.lang.Comparable,jdbcType=BLOB}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{simulated,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{logged,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{valueDictionary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{japcAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleIdsString, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0 )
